(name in full and in block letter) an employee of the Company. hereby revoke any or all nomination(s) made by me and hereby nominate the following as primary nominee(s) and as contingent nominee(s) to receive the amounts of Gratuity payable under the rules of the said Gratuity Policy, in the event of my death before the gratuity has become payable, of having become payable, gratuity payment has not been made.

Unless otherwise provided, I direct that in respect of the group of Primary Nominees and a group of contingent nominees, respectively that if one or more such nominee(s) predecease, me or the above nominee(s) within the group, the Survivor(s) within the group shall be entitled to share and share alike during their survivorship, to the share that would be otherwise payable to one or more so dying. No contingent nominee(s) shall be entitled to receive any payment except on the death of all primary nominee(s).


I hereby declare that any payment made by the Company in accordance with this nomination shall be a good, valid and effective discharge of the Company.
